Class.ClassComment: DriverUnloader /** * Helper class used by the upgrade tests to unload JDBC drivers loaded in separate class loaders. This class must live in the same class loader as the drivers it attempts to unload. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Deregister all Derby drivers accessible from the class loader in which this class lives. * @return {@code true} if a driver was unloaded, {@code false} otherwise */
